mean_cn: n. 听力，听觉，试听；  vi. 试唱
mean_en: to try out for a role in a play or film, a position in an orchestra, etc. :to perform in an audition
word_etyma: audit听 + ion名词后缀 → audition 听觉，试唱
short_phrase: audition for the play on stage
sentence: The man got an audition for a part in the film.
sentence_trans: 这个男人获得了一个电影角色的试镜机会。
